00007   int TriggerBits::__nonPedestalTriggerMask= ~(  TriggerBits::kPedestal 
00008                                                | TriggerBits::kCrcOscillator 
00009                                                | TriggerBits::kExternalPulser 
00010                                                | TriggerBits::kSpill 
00011                                                | TriggerBits::kGeneric 
00012                                                | TriggerBits::kExternalLED);
00013 
00014   int TriggerBits::__mask= ~(  TriggerBits::kSpill 
00015                              | TriggerBits::kGeneric);
00016 
00017     // ~(TriggerBits::kGeneric | TriggerBits::kSpill);

00020   const char *CALICE::TriggerBits::__names[32]={
00021     //"UNKNOWN",    // 0    
00022     "BEAM_Ext",    // 0    
00023     "BEAMDATA",   // 1
00024     "PEDESTAL",   // 2
00025     "COSMICS",    // 3
00026     "Calib",      // 4
00027     "Veto",       // 5
00028     "Cherenkov",  // 6
00029     "SC1_3x3",    // 7
00030     "SC2_3x3",    // 8
00031     "SC1_10x10",  // 9
00032     "SC2_10x10",  //10
00033     "SC1_100x100",//11
00034     "SC2_100x100",//12
00035     "Spill",      //13
00036     "CrcOscillator",     //14
00037     "ExternalPulser", //15
00038     "ExternalLED",           //16
00039     "HorizontalFinger",           //17
00040     "VerticalFinger",           //18
00041     "Veto_UL",           //19
00042     "Veto_DR",           //20
00043     "Veto_UR",           //21
00044     "Veto_DL",           //22
00045     "SC1_20x20",           //23
00046     "Veto_20x20",           //24
00047     "Cherenkov2",           //25
00048     "SC1_50x50",           //26
00049     "SC2_50x50",           //27
00050     "UTA1_19x19",           //28
00051     "UTA2_19x19",           //29
00052     "MUON_EXT",           //30
00053     "GENERICBIT"  //31
00054   };

00056   std::ostream &CALICE::TriggerBits::print(std::ostream &out) const
00057   {
00058     if (_bits) {
00059       out << "Triggers: ";
00060       if (isSpill())            out << __names[kSpillBit]         << "; ";
00061       if (isGeneric())          out << __names[kGenericBit]       << "; ";
00062       if (isPedestalTrigger())  { if (isPedestalTrigger() && (_bits & __nonPedestalTriggerMask)==0) {out << "pure ";} out << __names[kPedestalBit]      << "; ";}
00063       if (isCalibTrigger())     { if (isPureCalibTrigger())    {out << "pure ";} out << __names[kCalibBit]         << "; ";}
00064       if (isCrcOscillator())    out << __names[kCrcOscillatorBit] << "; ";
00065       if (isExternalPulser()) out << __names[kExternalPulserBit] << "; ";
00066       if (isBeamTrigger())      { if (isPureBeamTrigger())     {out << "pure ";} out << __names[kBeamBit]          << "; ";}
00067       if (isCosmicsTrigger())   { if (isPureCosmicsTrigger())  {out << "pure ";} out << __names[kCosmicsBit]       << "; ";}
00068 
00069       if (isSc1_3x3() && isSc2_3x3()) out << " coincidence 3x3; ";
00070       else {
00071         if (isSc1_3x3()) out << __names[kSC1_3x3Bit] << "; ";
00072         if (isSc2_3x3()) out << __names[kSC2_3x3Bit] << "; ";
00073       }
00074 
00075       if (isSc1_10x10() && isSc2_10x10()) out << " coincidence 10x10; ";
00076       else {
00077         if (isSc1_10x10()) out << __names[kSC1_10x10Bit] << "; ";
00078         if (isSc2_10x10()) out << __names[kSC2_10x10Bit] << "; ";
00079       }
00080 
00081       if (isSc1_100x100() && isSc2_100x100()) out << " coincidence 100x100; ";
00082       else {
00083         if (isSc1_100x100()) out << __names[kSC1_100x100Bit] << "; ";
00084         if (isSc2_100x100()) out << __names[kSC2_100x100Bit] << "; ";
00085       }
00086 
00087 
00088       if (isUta1_19x19() && isUta2_19x19()) out << " coincidence UTA 19x19; ";
00089       else {
00090         if (isUta1_19x19()) out << __names[kUTA1_19x19Bit] << "; ";
00091         if (isUta2_19x19()) out << __names[kUTA2_19x19Bit] << "; ";
00092       }
00093 
00094       if (isVetoTrigger())      out << __names[kVetoBit]          << "; ";
00095       if (isCherenkovTrigger()) out << __names[kCherenkovBit]     << "; ";
00096       if (isCherenkov2Trigger()) out << __names[kCherenkov2Bit]     << "; ";
00097       if (isExternalLED())      out << __names[kExternalLEDBit]     << "; ";      
00098       if (isVetoUL())      out << __names[kVetoULBit]     << "; ";      
00099       if (isVetoDR())      out << __names[kVetoDRBit]     << "; ";      
00100       if (isVetoUR())      out << __names[kVetoURBit]     << "; ";      
00101       if (isVetoDL())      out << __names[kVetoDLBit]     << "; ";      
00102       if (isSc1_20x20()) out << __names[kSC1_20x20Bit] << "; ";    
00103       if (isSc1_50x50()) out << __names[kSC1_50x50Bit] << "; ";    
00104       if (isSc2_50x50()) out << __names[kSC2_50x50Bit] << "; ";    
00105       if (isVeto_20x20()) out << __names[kVeto_20x20Bit] << "; "; 
00106       if (isMuon_Ext()) out << __names[kMuon_ExtBit] << "; "; }
00107     return out;
00108   }
00109 
00110   unsigned int TriggerBits::getBit(const char *name) {
00111     
00112     for (unsigned int bit_i=0;bit_i<32; bit_i++) {
00113       if (strcmp(name,__names[bit_i])==0) {
00114         return bit_i;
00115       }
00116     }
00117     return 32;
00118   }
